catalog_info.title: Microfabrication Laboratory
catalog_info.prereq: Recommended: Applied Physics 50a and 50b, Physical Sciences 12a and 12b, Physics 11a and 11b (no longer offered); or Physics 15a and 15b or equivalent.
catalog_info.description: Content and requirements are similar to Engineering Sciences 177, with the addition that students enrolled in Engineering Sciences 277 are assigned more demanding problem sets (which may involve laboratory process demonstrations and analysis) and are required to prepare a term project.
